summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Where Is My Kid landing page - all backend APIs and frontend components working correctly with successful integration

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent accessibility
design_issues.note: Console warning only, functionality works correctly

passed_tests: Contact lead creation with all required fields

Lead retrieval endpoint returns all records
Validation error handling for missing required fields
Hero section renders with logo, tagline, CTA buttons
Navigation links scroll to correct sections (Features, How It Works, Benefits, Contact)
Request Demo button opens modal dialog successfully
Demo modal form has all required fields (School Name, Name, Email, Phone)
Contact section form submits successfully to /api/leads endpoint
All sections render correctly: Problem, Features, How It Works, Benefits, Audience
Footer displays correctly with logo and copyright
Phone mockup displays in hero section
Form submissions successfully save to database
